vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.33.11;
son of: Elishama (H0476);
father of: Joshua (H3091)
§ Nun = "fish" or "posterity"
father of Joshua the successor of Moses
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Elisamá; padre de Josué; tribu de Efraín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
嫩 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "魚" 或 "後裔"
摩西的傳人約書亞的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
嫩 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "鱼" 或 "后裔"
摩西的传人约书亚的父亲
